affirmation: I am love. I am purpose. I was made with divine intention.
I can. I will. End of story.
Is there anything you can do right now that will make time spent on this Earth worth it?
Listen to your breath for ten seconds. What is your body telling you?
How will what you're learning help you towards your vision of your life?
What would be the name of your private space in the universe? Who or what would you want there?
How does anyting on your vision board contribute to your happiness?
